extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Apache Struts Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the installed Apache Struts version is within the affected range (2.0.0 through 2.5.32 and 6.0.0 through 6.3.0.1).

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the Apache Struts version affected?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Apache Struts
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to a non-vulnerable version of Apache Struts to mitigate the vulnerability.
